properties.entry: INSERT INTO MG_ADMIN (ADMIN_NO, ADMIN_NAME, ADMIN_ID, ADMIN_PWD, ADMIN_PNO, EMAIL) VALUES (SEQ_ADMIN_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectEncryptPwd() */ A.ADMIN_PWD FROM MG_ADMIN A WHERE A.ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ADMIN_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.member.model.dao.MemberDAO#selectLoginMember() */ A.ADMIN_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.ADMIN_ID , A.ADMIN_PNO , A.EMAIL , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_STATUS FROM MG_ADMIN A WHERE A.ADMIN_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.ADMIN_ID = ?

SELECT /* com.greedy.jsp.notice.model.dao.NoticeDAO#selectAllNoticeList() */ A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY A.NOTICE_NO DESC
INSERT INTO MG_NOTICE A ( A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MG_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_COUNT = (SELECT B.NOTICE_COUNT FROM MG_NOTICE B WHERE B.NOTICE_NO = ? ) + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = ?

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.CREATED_DATE FROM MG_NOTICE A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = ?
